name: Rails 6 boilerplate with devise, JWT, graphQL, CanCanCan and RailsAdmin
description: This is a boilerplate to build your next SaaS product. It's a RubyOnRails 6 backend with Authentication and GraphQL API. It works nicely together with clients made with React.js & React.Native or any other frontend which implements the JSON Web Tokens philosophy.

DEVISE_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed JWT tokens.

DEFAULT_URL.description: Enter the url of this application. If you deploy to heroku set your heroku address.

CLIENT_URL.description: Enter the client domain for CORS.

DEVISE_MAILER_FROM.description: Set the default from address for mailers.

IS_HTTP_AUTH_PROTECTED.description: Enable http auth protection with setting this to true.

HTTP_AUTH_USER.description: Set user for HTTP Auth protection.

HTTP_AUTH_PASSWORD.description: Set password for HTTP Auth protection.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: Specifies the number of `workers` to boot in clustered mode.

RAILS_MAX_THREADS.description: Puma can serve each request in a thread from an internal thread pool.

SMTP_ADDRESS.description: Set a smtp server for sending emails.

SMTP_PORT.description: Set the port for sending mails.
